rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with minimalistic Bohemian decor and ambient lighting.
Large open living area featuring eclectic Bohemian furniture, natural light, and a blend of modern and traditional elements.
Functional kitchen with an open layout and a small dining area integrated for efficiency on a tight budget.
Compact living space dedicated to servants with essential amenities and storage for kitchen utilities.
Intimate home theater setup with integrated seating and minimalistic acoustic treatment, ensuring an immersive experience without excessive expenditure.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Balcony providing natural ventilation and a view of the garden area; ideal for relaxation.
Access point to an in-ground swimming pool, designed with water features and a retractable cover for year-round use.

vastu_summary.general_orientation: The penthouse is oriented east-west with the main entrance facing north-east to maximize positive energy flow.
specific_notes: Living room placement in south-west aligns with relaxation and social interaction.
Kitchen in south-east ensures efficient energy flow during meal preparation.
Servants' quarters are placed strategically in the north-west, away from high-traffic zones.
